article_title: A Financial Adviser Creates LLCs to Protect a Client's Assets from Lawsuits
article_text:
The middle-aged couple was in sound financial shape.

They had $10 million saved in bank and brokerage accounts, and the wife also had a $10 million ownership stake in a successful business.

When they came to adviser Jeff Camarda, chairman of Camarda Wealth Advisory Group in Fleming Island, Fla., their most pressing concern was...

twitter.description: Florida-based adviser Jeff Camarda helped set up two LLCs to hold his clients' $20 million in assets to shelter them from lawsuits.
twitter.title: The `Steel Wall' of LLCs

image.alt: A Financial Adviser Creates LLCs to Protect a Client's Assets from Lawsuits

article_summary:
When they came to adviser Jeff Camarda, chairman of Camarda Wealth Advisory Group in Fleming Island, Fla., their most pressing concern was...
They had $10 million saved in bank and brokerage accounts, and the wife also had a $10 million ownership stake in a successful business.
The middle-aged couple was in sound financial shape.
